channel.title: SevenAtSevenLastSection
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenLastSection, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Woman With HIV Spent Six Years in Solitary. She Sued and Missouri Will Change Its Policy.
item.description: Honesty Bishop was attacked by her cellmate. Prison officials deemed her sexually active and kept her in isolation for more than 2,000 days.
